Class NioConfig

    public abstract class NioConfig
extends SocketBean
implements IConfig
     NIOSocket本地机配置类。
 Socket公共配置继承自SocketBean类。

    SUPPORT : https://exp-blog.com

    JDK 1.8+

    2022-03-06

    EXP: exp.lqb@foxmail.com
